name: Town (Lee Kempton )
description:
Town is a short interactive experience where the player finds themselves in a strange, abstract place seemingly void of life. The player must walk around, reading information from the environment, which is both the player's own thoughts and the thoughts of those who could possibly be past residents of the area.

The main goal of the game is to find a way out by collecting tools and keys in order to open more passage ways in order to escape.

This game is pretty basic but I hope you enjoy playing it and please feel free to leave some feedback if you want.

Youtube Playthrough:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mKY-GsjZvCc&feature=youtu.be
